name: Rottentomatoes-api
tagline: getting attributes of the films currently in theaters and then storing into a relational database (sqlite3) using python.
body:
###Description  
This project uses the rottentomatoes API to get a list of attributes and then store that information into a relational Database. It is written in python 2.7.

### Authors and Contributors
Gurkamal Rakhra (@gurkamaldeep)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
